text: [Suajʙ] Guft: «Ej qavmi man, ʙa man ʙigued, [ki] agar az suji Parvardigoram dalel [-u mu'cizai] oskore dosta ʙosam va az coniʙi xes ruzii nakuie ʙa man ato karda ʙosad [on goh ci mekuned]? Va man namexoham dar on ci sumoro az on ʙozmedoram, ʙo sumo muxolifat kunam [vale xud ancomas diham]. To on co dar tavon doram, cuz isloh namexoham va tavfiqi man tanho ʙa [lutfu xosti] Xudost, ʙar U tavakkal kardam va ʙa suji U ʙozmegardam
